title: Beachbody Chalean Extreme Deluxe
description:
BEACHBODY'S CHALEAN EXTREME DELUXE 90 DAY WORKOUT PROGRAM

Get ready to burn fat, boost your metabolism, and get LEAN with ChaLEAN Extreme. Beachbody trainer Chalene Johnson uses cardio and resistance training in a brand-new way to get you better results in less time. Now you can burn up to 60% of your body fat in just 3 months and see visible results every 30 days!

The secret is Lean Phasing. Chalene Johnson's technique shifts your fat-burning focus from cardio to resistance training. By adding resistance training in 3 steps, you'll build lean muscle, and that's what supercharges your metabolism so you burn fat long after your workoutÃ¢â‚¬â€even while you sleep.

ChaLEAN Extreme Deluxe comes with 17 workouts, Extreme Motivation CD, Muscle Burns Fat Guidebook and Fat Burning Food Guide.

The Workouts

1. Burn Basics/Healthy Eats & Kitchen Makeover : Before you start, Chalene teaches you the proper form and technique for the resistance moves youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be doing in the program, whether youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re using weights or bands.

2. Burn Circuit 1, Burn Circuit 2, Burn Circuit 3 (3 workouts) : This is Step 1 of ChaLEAN Extreme. You start lifting weights to jump-start your metabolism and break down those "extra" reserves of fat. In these moderate training workouts, you'll work your upper body then lower body, and learn how Lean Phasing will help you see major results every 30 days.

3. Push Circuit 1, Push Circuit 2, Push Circuit 3 (3 workouts) : This is Step 2 of ChaLEAN Extreme. Chalene shows you how to lift heavyÃ¢â‚¬â€beyond your comfort zoneÃ¢â‚¬â€so you build the muscle you need to burn fat. Chalene makes it easier than it sounds with incredibly fast results.

4. Lean Circuit 1, Lean Circuit 2, Lean Circuit 3 (3 workouts) : This is Step 3 of ChaLEAN Extreme. Here is where you really bring it home with new routines and dynamic moves that literally melt the fat off your body. You will be blown away with jaw-dropping results and rewarded with a brand-new body.

5. Burn Intervals, Burn it off!, Recharge (3 workouts) : This is the Extreme Cardio phase. Accelerate your results with these calorie-scorching cardio routines and then rejuvenate and lengthen your body with this invigorating flexibility workout.

7. Ab burner, Extreme Abs (2 workouts) : These two BONUS workouts help you shrink, tighen, and tone your core for rock hard abs.

8. Fat Burning Challenge, Get Lean Intervals, I've Got Abs (3 Deluxe Workouts) : Add to your collection of the ChaLEAN Extreme system with three more intense cardio and weight training workouts to keep you in the fat-burning zone even longer.

Helpful Tools

BONUS: Fat-Burning Food Guide : Shows you what to eat in each step to maximize fat burning.
Muscle Burns Fat Guidebook : Includes workout calendars to show you which workout to do each day and how much weight to lift.

Note: This torrent has all Chalean Extreme workouts except the four newest deluxe workouts. Workouts NOT included are:

1. Lower Body Extreme Zone
2. Extreme Core Circuit
3. Extreme Intervals
4. Dynamic Flow Yoga

These four workouts were ADDED to the original deluxe package at a later date. This torrent is the original Chalean Extreme Deluxe package. THE ABOVE FOUR WORKOUTS ARE NOT INCLUDED IN THIS TORRENT. I do, however, plan on making another torrent with the above workouts on a later date when I get the DVDs. I currently do not have them
